MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG2 postcode area of Dumfries. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10am to repair faulty electrical equipment at Braco Square and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.25am on Monday 7th December 2020.
